guidelines: Should be one of the first focusable elements on the page
Must be visible when focused to meet WCAG requirements
Target element should have appropriate focus handling
Provides way to bypass repetitive navigation content
accessibility.aria_support: Uses semantic link element with descriptive text and title attributes

best_practices: Place skip links at the very beginning of page content
Use descriptive text that clearly indicates the target
Ensure target element can receive focus or has tabindex
Consider providing multiple skip links for complex layouts
Ensure skip link is visible when focused for sighted keyboard users
technical_notes: Uses ct-visually-hidden utility to hide by default
Includes platform detection for iOS-specific handling
Focus visibility handled through CSS overrides

notes: Component has experimental status in source
